header_text: You are volunteering at an event for a local food bank. You snap angrily at another volunteer when they interrupt you to ask you a question. They look at you with surprise as you take a breath and apologize.

elements.Text: Are you able to recover from your outburst?

elements.name: You are volunteering at an event for a local food bank. You snap angrily at another volunteer when they interrupt you to ask you a question. They look at you with surprise as you take a breath and apologize._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
